response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which I believe would significantly benefit and enhance your operations. Given its exceptional value and quality, I am confident it will be a valuable asset to you. Considering its worth to you, we propose a price of $1,150,000 for this exclusive item. This offer is designed to provide you with a competitive advantage while ensuring a fair return for us. We look forward to discussing how this product can contribute to your success.", "product_price": 1150000}
